import React, { Component } from 'react' import history from '../history' import TwitterLogo from "./images/twitter.png" export class SideBar extends Component { render() { return (














{Searchdata.length? Searchdata.map(Search=>
{Search.first_name}{Search.last_name}
@{Search.username}
):"No Search"}
) } } export default SideBar
